short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keeps the session alive by clicking a specific button periodically.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I hate logging out aims to keep user sessions alive on specific websites by automatically clicking a designated button at regular intervals. This functionality helps users avoid the inconvenience of logging out due to session timeouts, enhancing their browsing experience on sites without manual intervention.

Release:
v1.0.0: Draft
v1.0.1: 
  - Chrome Extension name's changed.
